overview: An anthology film of stories told by The Car Field Cat, a lazy, fat, lasagna-loving and Monday-hating misanthrope. In between scenes we see his daily life with his roommate John Esko. MANLY MAN MENU. Three dude-bros discover an advertised menu might be more than they can digest as they rush into a restaurant. SERGEANT CLOWN. Clown Academy's veteran drill instructor is 100% no-nonsense to his new recruits. BEVERLY HILLS POLIZIOTTESCI. A fish-out-of-water law enforcer runs into trouble in a prestigious neighborhood. At this point the tape breaks and we are shown another VHS movie about the IMPORTANT POINTS IN HISTORY, with a familiar host.
title: Car Field Stories
